title: MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White) | 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 Inch
descriptions:
Introducing the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage, the ultimate home for your furry friend! This Awesome Arcade Hamster Home in a sleek white color is the perfect size at 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 inches and comes with all the essential accessories your hamster needs, including an exercise wheel, water bottle, food bowl, nesting nook, and interior play tubes.

With its multi-level play space, deep base for bedding, top door access, and removable upper cover, your hamster will have the time of its life exploring and playing. The modular design and standard play tube connectors make it easy to customize and expand the cage to keep your pet entertained.

Best of all, no tools are required for assembly, and it comes with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty for peace of mind. Give your hamster the home it deserves with the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage - order now!
